channel.title: Comments on: Ace Is In Heat
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Shai
item.dc:creator: Shai
item.description: I can't believe the "how to calm a cat in heat" link... Thinking about it makes me nauseous too !
item.content:encoded:
I can’t believe the “how to calm a cat in heat” link…
Thinking about it makes me nauseous too !

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I remember, but it doesn't seem like it's an option these days. No one offers it. Anyway, spaying is probably the right way to go - it also prevents all kinds of illness later.
item.content:encoded: I remember, but it doesn’t seem like it’s an option these days. No one offers it. Anyway, spaying is probably the right way to go – it also prevents all kinds of illness later.

item.title: By: 725176
item.description: you can prevent it also by pills but - there is a but: it can cause cancer. It did to Punch.
item.content:encoded: you can prevent it also by pills but – there is a but: it can cause cancer. It did to Punch.
